summary: This mod adds a dashing Imperial Rogue named "Largo", to the Black-Briar meadery in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Largo Follower

[/size][/color][/font][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]This mod introduces Largo, a dashing Imperial rogue/thief to Skyrim. You can find him lounging about at the Black-Briar meadery in Riften. He comes equipped with unique weapons and armor based from the Witcher 2, and has master lockpicking, stealth and dual-wielding perks/skills. His skills may be a teeny bit overpowered, however he levels with you at a ratio of 0.75 per level, so really he is only as powerful as you are. 

[/color][/font][/size][i][size=4]*Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested! [/size][/i][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]


[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. *[b][u]NOTE: Largo 'might' appear naked upon first meeting him, simply hire him and then quickly exit the building he should then be fully clothed.[/u][/b] 
[/color][/font][/size]
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable (Non-RDO only)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique Voice (Male Commander)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique weapons & armor [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to [/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies [/url]﻿& Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for The Eyes of Beauty [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/]Cloudedtruth[/url]﻿ for Relationship Dialogue Overhaul [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mods I'm using [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]The following mods are used in these screenshots, however are not included in the mod itself (besides one sword & and one outfit from the Witcher mods), and come highly recommended. 

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Facelight[/url]﻿ by Tktk1[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better males & younger faces[/url]﻿ by Chris57 [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78385]The Witcher 2 Armor Collection[/url]﻿ by ArwingXL, Afrotoast42-Lordofwar-Redxavier-TH3WICK3D1[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71633]The Witcher 3 Weaponry[/url]﻿ by Oaristys [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]﻿ by Dheuster[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
